node.html: A opencv project detecting laziness on live webcam.Counts yawning using facial landmarks and the changes in distance between lips.
It includes data-set creation using augmentation,training the model,extracting credit card using Canny and identifying the digits using the Model created.
Takes the image,sharpens the image,removes the noise,finds the contour nad passes it to PyTesseract for OCR reading.
Reads name and email from link to google-sheet and sends email to everyone using outlook SMTP server.
Simple script to get current attendance for each course for IIIT-H students.
A simple application where seller could host,sell and dispatch products when there are enough orders.
A simple command line game in python using OOPs concepts.
Instagram doesnot provide seen list of users 24 hours after one posts a story. Using this,one can store the seen list of each story in a database.

node.html: A DBMS project with features like user authentication,admin login,like,report and delete similar to YouTube.Queries are processed using pymysql.
A Bash like shell in C using Linux system calls, includes user-defined commands, piping, redirection and signal handling.
